chapter.title: Static routes
chapter.para: Static routes is mechanism to configure routes between networks.
Static routes are widely used in organisations in order to connect local area networks. Also static routes can be used in virtual networks to connect virtual machines.

sect1.title: Routes list
sect1.para: To get routes list use command: ip route

sect1.title: Add a route
sect1.para: To add a route to network 192.168.19.0 through gateway 10.20.200.1 use command: ip route add 192.168.19.0/24 via 10.20.200.1

sect1.title: Delete a route
sect1.para: To delete a route to network 192.168.19.0 through gateway 10.20.200.1 use command: ip route del 192.168.19.0/24 via 10.20.200.1
